thread.title: Donald Szlezyngier
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Donald Szlezyngier

author: Donald Szlezyngier
title: Donald Szlezyngier
text:
The quality we found to equal furniture in more up scale stores for half the price. Delivery was quick and on time and the workers were very pleasant and efficient in what they did. A very good experience Over all.
Store sales people were extremely helpful in making our decision.
